ClickHeat.LANG_LOGIN_ERROR: Login error, wrong user or password
ClickHeat.LANG_UNKNOWN_DIR: Can't define current directory, please contact us
ClickHeat.LANG_LAYOUT_LIQUID: Liquid content/menu (automatic adjusting to available space)
ClickHeat.LANG_LAYOUT_2: Fixed centered content (automatic left and right margins)
ClickHeat.LANG_LAYOUT_3: Fixed content stuck to the left (automatic right margin)
ClickHeat.LANG_LAYOUT_5: Fixed left and right menus, liquid content
ClickHeat.LANG_LAYOUT_6: Fixed content stuck to the right (automatic left margin)
ClickHeat.LANG_LATEST_KO: Can't find dynamically the latest available version, yours is %s, the latest one read directly from Dugwood's website is
ClickHeat.LANG_LATEST_OK: You have the latest available version (%s)
ClickHeat.LANG_LATEST_NO: Your version (%s) isn't the latest available one (%s). You can download the latest one on our website:
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_ADMIN_COOKIE:
In order to avoid pollution of your statistics,
you can choose not to log your own clicks

OK = log my clicks
Cancel = don't log my clicks
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT: Javascript code to be pasted on pages you want to study
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_IMAGE: Show ClickHeat logo on the studied page:
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_QUOTA: Maximum clicks per page and visitor, next clicks won't be saved (0 = no limit, 3 is a good choice)
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_SITE: Website name (allowed characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, underscore, hyphen, dot)
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_GROUP: Group name, to group similar pages for a simpler analysis
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_GROUP1: allowed characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, underscore, hyphen, dot
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_GROUP2: use webpage's title (not recommended)
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_GROUP3: use webpage's URL (not recommended)
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_PASTE: Copy and paste the code below on your pages, just before the end of the page (before </body> tag):
ClickHeat.LANG_JAVASCRIPT_DEBUG: Once the code pasted on your pages, don't forget to test if the code works correctly, by calling your page with the parameter debugclickheat. For example for http://www.site.com/index.html call http://www.site.com/index.html?debugclickheat. You should see a message showing the state of Clickheat. If you encounter any problem, feel free to contact us
ClickHeat.LANG_NO_CLICK_BELOW: Leave below this line in English please
No clicks recorded beneath this line
ClickHeat.LANG_ERROR_DATA: No logs for the selected period (first think removing filters: browser, screensize). _JAVASCRIPT_
ClickHeat.LANG_ERROR_JAVASCRIPT: Did you correctly installed Javascript code on your webpages?
ClickHeat.LANG_ERROR_FIXED: All widths are fixed, that is not possible. Please change one of your layout width above.
ClickHeat.LANG_CHECK_NOT_WRITABLE: PHP hasn't got write permission in the configuration directory
ClickHeat.LANG_CHECK_GD_IMG: imagecreatetruecolor() unavailable, can't create images (with good quality), check that GD is installed
ClickHeat.LANG_CHECK_GD_ALPHA: imagecolorallocatealpha() unavailable, can't create transparent images (you can ignore this, but transparency is really recommended)
ClickHeat.LANG_CHECK_GD_PNG: imagepng() unavailable, can't create PNG images, sorry
ClickHeat.LANG_CHECKS_KO: One or more tests have failed. Please correct problems and refresh this page.
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_LOGPATH_DIR: Logfiles directory doesn't exist. Please create it
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_LOGPATH_KO: Logfiles directory doesn't have write permissions, please give it write permission for PHP user
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_CACHEPATH_DIR: Temporary files directory doesn't exist. Please create it
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_CACHEPATH_KO: Temporary files directory doesn't have write permissions, please give it write permission for PHP user
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_REFERERS: Domain names (separated by commas) allowed to log clicks on this server
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_GROUPS: Group names (separated by commas) allowed to log clicks on this server
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_FILESIZE: Maximum logfile size (in KB) of a group over a day (1000 clicks are about 25KB, 0 = no size limit)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_MEMORY: Memory limit (default php.ini value: %dMB, limits: from %d to %dMB, but be careful with high values)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_MEMORY_KO: please stay in the specified range
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_STEP: Clicks grouping by X*X pixels' zones (speed up display of heatmaps)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_PALETTE: If you see red squares on heatmaps check this box
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_YESTERDAY: Show yesterday statistics at start (rather than today)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_FLUSH: Automatic flush of statistics older than X days (0 = keep all files, not recommended)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_VIEWER_LOGIN: Visitor's identifier (if empty, account is disabled)
ClickHeat.LANG_CONFIG_LOGIN: identifier must be at least 4 characters
ClickHeat.LANG_CLEANER_RUN: Cleaning finished: %d files and %d directories have been deleted
ClickHeat.LANG_UPGRADE_NEXT: Check your configuration, then save it to finish upgrade
